simplifiedChinese.title: Paul on Trial in Caesarea
simplifiedChinese.Question1: Paul gives his testimony twice in this passage. How does he describe his life before meeting Jesus?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: How does Paul describe his encounter with Jesus?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: How does Paul describe his life as a follower of Jesus?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Write your own story, including these three elements: your life before Jesus, your encounter with Jesus, and your life as a follower of Jesus. Make a plan to share your story with someone this week.
